body:
Comment 17: 
Could you

x/20i 0x00037bb4
x/20xw 0x00037bb4

so that I can see the entire
instruction stream from the
beginning of the function in both
assembly and hex?

The issue is very likely that the
software floating point is not
handling an instruction it should.
It's possible that it's the vmov.f64
but it's equally possible that it's
something earlier.

Thanks.
Russ
